title: Cryptoworldman
author: Cryptoworldman
content: ⚙️ Our service list ⚙️🔹Merketing topic_ Bounty campaign 🔹🐦1. 500k Tweeted, Retweeted and also good comments complete ( 500/600 Hunter- They will do your project work every day)  ▶️ 2. Contents creator ( Youtube Video, Tiktok, Blog, Article) ⭐️3. All social campaign ( Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram etc)✍4. Signature campaign ( Discuss about project In Bitcointalk Form)✅5. Exchange tending service( Twitter exchange CEX,DEX comment And Telegram exchange about project discuss)✍️✍️✍️✍️✍️✍️✍️✍️✍️✍️✍️✍️Bounty campaign will benefit the project :1. Token holder - will get increase which is the main point of any project.2. Social Media: Twitter, Facebook, Telegram etc community will get a lot of increase.  As in Airdrop.  Airdrop one person works once but in bounty that one person works for 1 month.  Together 500/1000 people work for 1 month3. Project logo becomes viral and investors will be attracted4. 200/300 video projects will be reviewed from 1000-50000 subscribe channel on Youtube which is very useful.5. Whitelist vote and Good comment feedback 1K+ service on Coinmarketcap and CoinGecko and Playstore.
